description:
Feed the Beast is one and done at AMC. AMC电视台宣布不再续订《盘中兽》。

The cable network canceled the restaurant drama starring David Schwimmer and Jim Sturgess on Friday, according to The Hollywood Reporter. 《好莱坞报道者》报道，AMC砍掉了这部David Schwimmer和Jim Sturgess主演的餐厅主题美剧。

"We have great respect and admiration for the entire team associated with Feed the Beast, starting with [showrunner] Clyde Phillips, [stars] David Schwimmer, Jim Sturgess and our studio partner, Lionsgate. Unfortunately, the show simply didn't achieve the results needed to move forward with a second season," AMC said in a statement.AMC电视台在声明中写道：“我们尊敬并赞赏《盘中兽》全体工作人员的付出，包括制作人Clyde Phillips、主演David Schwimmer和Jim Sturgesshe，以及我们的合作方Lionsgate。不过很可惜的是，这部剧第一季的表现并没有达到能够续订第二季的标准。”

title: AMC宣布取消《盘中兽》
